title: Celtic Fire
description: Fifteen years ago, Aislin Flanery lost her mother. With her death, she also lost any link to a father she has never met. Now the moment is right for Aislin to receive a gift from her mother, brought to her by her mom's best friend, kept for her until she was ready. A gift that will set her on a journey that will change her forever. Traveling to Scotland in search of her father, she gets caught up in a war that has raged for thousands of years.  He is a Guardian, created to protect those that couldn't protect themselves. He is sent to find her, and discover her true intentions. However, he ends up finding so much more; destiny is funny that way.  Not all stories have happy endings!  *Warning* Celtic Fire has some very dark parts. There are graphic scenes that include sex, torture and physical and mental abuse. These could trigger or cause some emotional suffering. Consider this a warning.
author: S. Lawrence
